text.__SUMMARY__: Psilocybe bispora is a species of psilocybin mushroom in the family Hymenogastraceae. Found in Colombia, where it grows in subtropical cloudforest in the mountains of Antioquia, it was described as new to science in 2007 by mycologist Gastón Guzmán and colleagues.
